vertical_testing_options.title: Options for vertical testing
vertical_testing_options.description: Vertical testing allows you to create and test files of increasing size.

skip_vertical_testing.description: Enable generation of FASTQ files for filesystem testing.

vertical_testing_file_count.description: Number of GENERATE_FASTQ processes which generate a single FASTQ file.

fastq_num_reads.description: Number of reads to generate per GENERATE_FASTQ process.

fastq_read_length.description: Length of FASTQ reads to generate.

process_fastq_files.description: Whether to include FASTQ files in downstream file operations such as compress, archive, rename etc.

horizontal_testing_options.title: Options for horizontal testing
horizontal_testing_options.description: Horizontal testing allows you to create and test files of increasing number.

skip_horizontal_testing.description: Enable generation of files from /dev/zero for filesystem testing.

horizontal_testing_file_count.description: Number of miniature text files to generate from /dev/zero.

horizontal_testing_file_size.description: Size of zero file to generate in megabytes.

process_zero_files.description: Whether to include zero files in downstream file operations such as compress, archive, rename etc.

run.description: Selectively run a tool. If this option is enabled only tools with this name will be ran. Note: this may affect downstream tools.

skip.description: Selectively disable a tool. If this option is enabled a tool will be ignored. Note: this may affect downstream tools.
